name: Men's Haircut
description: Professional men's haircut with wash and basic styling. Includes consultation with stylist.

name: Women's Haircut
description: Women's haircut with wash, conditioning treatment, and blow-dry styling.

name: Full Hair Coloring
description: Complete hair coloring service with premium color products. Includes toner and deep conditioning.

name: Hair Spa Treatment
description: Relaxing hair spa with deep conditioning, scalp massage, and steam treatment.

name: Keratin Treatment
description: Professional keratin smoothing treatment for frizz-free, silky hair lasting 3-4 months.

name: Kids Haircut
description: Gentle haircut for children aged 3-12. Patient stylists, fun environment.

name: Bridal Hair & Makeup Package
description: Complete bridal package with hair styling, makeup, saree draping, and trial session.

name: Highlights/Balayage
description: Partial highlights or balayage with natural-looking dimension and color blending.

name: Blowdry & Styling
description: Professional blow-dry with styling for special occasions or everyday elegance.

name: Hair Extensions
description: Premium hair extension installation with natural hair blending and styling.

name: Classic Manicure
description: Traditional manicure with nail shaping, cuticle care, massage, and polish.

name: Spa Pedicure
description: Luxurious pedicure with foot soak, scrub, massage, and polish.

name: Gel Nails
description: Long-lasting gel manicure with UV curing. Lasts 2-3 weeks without chipping.

name: Facial Treatment (Basic)
description: Deep cleansing facial with steam, extraction, mask, and moisturizing.

name: Full Body Massage
description: Relaxing 90-minute full body massage with aromatherapy oils.

name: Bridal Trial Session
description: Complete bridal makeup and hair trial before your wedding day.

name: Party Makeup
description: Glamorous makeup for parties, events, and special occasions.

name: Saree Draping
description: Professional saree draping in traditional or modern styles.

name: Henna/Mehendi Design
description: Beautiful henna designs for hands and feet. Traditional or contemporary patterns.

name: Groom Grooming Package
description: Complete grooming for grooms: haircut, shave, facial, and styling.

name: Beard Trim & Shape
description: Precision beard trimming and shaping with hot towel treatment.

name: Hair Straightening
description: Permanent hair straightening treatment for smooth, straight hair.

name: Scalp Treatment
description: Specialized scalp treatment for dandruff, dryness, or hair fall concerns.

name: Hair Braiding Styles
description: Creative braiding styles including box braids, cornrows, and fishtail.

name: Color Touch-Up (Roots)
description: Root color touch-up for maintaining your hair color between full treatments.

name: Express Haircut
description: Quick haircut service for busy professionals. No wash included.

name: Premium Facial Treatment
description: Luxury anti-aging facial with serums, LED therapy, and face massage.

name: Waxing (Full Arms & Legs)
description: Complete waxing service for smooth, hair-free arms and legs.

name: Threading (Eyebrows & Upper Lip)
description: Precise threading for perfectly shaped eyebrows and upper lip hair removal.

name: Beach Waves Styling
description: Relaxed, beachy waves perfect for casual and coastal vibes.
